lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau gobMs iqn Kwie duhy gors dY; gors Aautwey diD mwKn pRgws hY [

Unknown.translation: As a cow grazes on grass and hay yields milk which when heated, cooled and set to coagulate as curd, butter is obtained;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jYsy qau gobMs iqRx Kwie duhy gors dY ijs pRkwr Pyr gobMs gaU jwqI gaU mwqR Gwh KwˆdI hY, qy duhy coieAwˆ qy go rs dY du`D id`qw krdI hY[ aus gors Aautwey duD nUM kwiVAwˆ diD mwKn pRgws hY jwg lgwn kr ky dhIˆ qy mKn dI pRgtqw huMdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: aUK mY ipaUK qn KMf KMf ky prwey; rs ky Aautwey KwNf imsrI imTws hY [

Unknown.translation: Sugarcane is sweet. It is put through a crusher to obtain its juice that is heated and converted into jaggery cakes and sugar crystals;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: aUK mY ipaUK kmwd dy gMny ivc AimRq rhu rs huMdw hY pr jd qn KMf KMf ky iprwey auh Apny srIr nUM iprwey ky kolU ivc ipVvw ky toty toty krvw is`tdw hY[ rs ky Aautwey Aqy Es rs nUM jd kwVIey BlI pRkwr aubwlIey qwˆ KMf imsrI imTws hY auh KMf imsrI Awid imiTAweIAwˆ bx jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn sugMD snbMD kY bnwspqI; Fwk Aau plws jYsy cMdn subws hY [

Unknown.translation: As a sandalwood tree infuses its fragrance in the vegetation that grows around it;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: cMdn sugMD snbMD kY bnwspqI ievyˆ hI jIkUM cMdn dI sRySt bwsnw dI sMgq myl kr ky bnwspqI Fwk Aau plws jYsy Fwk plwh iCCry dy JwVdwr qy aucy ibrCwˆ vrgI BI nIc jwq dI bnspqI cMdn subws hY cMdn rUp hI sugMDI vwlI bx jwˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: swDusMig imlq sMswrI inrMkwrI hoq; gurmiq praupkwr ky invws hY [129[

Unknown.translation: So does a worldly person become a humble servant of God in the company of saintly persons. By virtue of the teachings and initiation of Guru, he is blessed with the traits of doing good to all and sundry. (129)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iesI pRkwr swDsMig imlq sMswrI inrMkwrI hoq swD sMgiq ivKy imldy swr sMswrI mnu`K BI inrMkwrI bx jwˆdy hn ies qrHwˆ nwl gurmiq praupkwr kY invws hY gurmiq ivc qwˆ pr dUr vwsI ivCVÎwˆ nUM BI aupkwr smIpI pÎwrw inktI mylI bxw lYx vwly gux dw hI sdIv invws rihd hY[ AQvw gurmiq qy aupkwr dw invwsI Gr ieh sqsMg hY[ Bwv ijs qrHwˆ gaU jwqI dI sMgq ivKy, Gws iqRx Awid duD rUp AMimRq ho pRgtdw hY qy vylxy dI sMgq pw ky gMnw mDurqw dy srUp Dwrx vwlw bx jwˆdw hY, Aqy cMdn dI sMgq kwrx F`k plws Awid iCCry BI cMnx bx jwˆdy hn, iesy qrHwˆ swD sMgq nIc aUc sB sMswrIAwˆ nUM hI inrMkwrI gurU ky is`K bxw ilAw krdI hY ]129]
